descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
SchoolFriendMemories is a romantic adventure game where you can experience the fleeting moments of youth within the school, through heartwarming conversations with the heroine, Kanon Amane.

You will take on the role of the protagonist and navigate various scenarios in the school, gradually deepening your relationship with the heroine through everyday conversations.

Immerse yourself in a VR space that vividly captures the school atmosphere. Relive the seemingly mundane yet irreplaceable romance of your teenage years and enjoy a love story that feels both familiar and unique.

Additionally, the game features a quiz game segment focused on four categories: academics, sports, entertainment, and music/art. The skills you develop in these quizzes will influence slight changes in the ending.

Finally, the game includes an auto-save feature based on your progress. Please note that there is no data reset function within the game.

Just as your youth was a one-time experience, the experiences of "Seishun" you can savor in this game are also unique. Cherish every moment and enjoy the present.
